rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with large windows to enhance natural light and ventilation. Incorporates Brutalist design elements such as raw concrete textures and exposed structures.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom featuring a minimalist layout with emphasis on privacy and natural lighting through skylights and large openings. Vastu-aligned north-east placement for calm energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Functional bedroom ensuring ample daylight via north facing windows in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Compact and efficient space with design emphasis on natural ventilation using cross-ventilation techniques. Vastu-aligned east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Balanced bedroom design integrating natural light through strategically placed windows in the south to enhance comfort and energy balance according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated reading and study space designed with ample lighting from north-east and south openings. Features wall-to-wall bookshelves and comfortable seating areas for quiet introspection.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional modern kitchen with efficient workflow layout, incorporating Brutalist design elements like concrete finishes and minimalistic cabinetry. West-facing placement is avoided per Vastu to maintain positive energy.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Immersive entertainment space with soundproofing and optimized acoustics. Windows are minimized for light control while ensuring ventilation. Placement is towards the west for privacy, balanced with Vastu adjustments.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A communal dining area integrated with the living room that maximizes natural light through large north-facing windows and open-plan design. Complementary to Vastu principles.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Stately entrance designed in a Brutalist style with raw concrete and exposed structure, aligning with Vastu principles by facing the south-west for auspicious energy.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Secondary entrance used for service access; its placement respects Vastu guidelines ensuring balance in energy flow.
